name: Jan Falguera
title: Public Relations Exec
bio: Hi! I'm Jan a PhD student in the Department of Biochemistry in Dr. Justin Nodwell's lab. There I study the processes guiding cell division and antibiotic production in bacteria. This is my first season with Raw Talk, acting as a lead for sponsorships and funding. When I am not staring at colonies on agar plates I like to read, sleep and eat!
